Subjects: God, hymns to; hymns, to God; translations
_description: James Ryman, ‘Conditor alme siderum’ — six quatrains (aabb) and burden: ‘Conditor alme syderum / Eterna lux credencium / Criste Redemptor omnium / Exaudi preces supplicum’

CULEe112.First Lines:
holy maker of sterres brightOf feithefull man eternall
                    light…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Also vnto the holigoostBothe tre & one of myghtes
                    moost
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
